user_instruction: 'Send Ethan the details for the book cover design (ethan.designs@freelancegfx.com). You can check out my Notion for information.'

          "type": "paragraph",
          "created_time": "2025-05-15T00:49:00.000Z",
          "last_edited_time": "2025-05-15T00:49:00.000Z",
          "has_children": false,
          "text": "The book cover for 'Whispers of the Past' should evoke a sense of mystery and nostalgia. The main elements to include are an old, ornate key and a faded letter.           "last_edited_time": "2025-05-15T00:49:00.000Z",
          "has_children": false,
          "text": "While the plot of 'Whispers of the Past' is somewhat clichéd with predictable twists, and the characters lack depth, the setting descriptions are vivid and could be visually compelling for the cover design."

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["ethan.designs@freelancegfx.com"],"subject":"Book Cover Design Brief – “Whispers of the Past”","body":"Hi Ethan,

I hope you’re well! Here are the key details for the cover design of my upcoming novel, “Whispers of the Past”:

• Overall mood: A blend of mystery and nostalgia.
• Central imagery: An old, ornate key paired with a faded letter.
• Colour palette: Muted earth tones.
• Themes to capture: Hidden secrets, memories resurfacing.

I have a short synopsis and author bio that provide more context—just let me know if you’d like me to send those along.

Thanks so much, and I’m looking forward to collaborating!

Best regards,
[Your Name]"}

formatted_items.content: Email sent to Ethan with the cover brief.

final_output: Email sent to Ethan with the cover brief.
